name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D】hololive English -Advent- 2nd Anniversary Live： On the Run! [dpcCFGRm5zM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: The members of hololive English -Advent- conclude a game of Fukuwarai (blindfolded face-making) and receive a message from Pokey.
Post-performance MC section where the members announce their upcoming new original song, 'PRISONER'.

subtitles.original: To everybody watching right now... We all have some big news!

subtitles.original: And guess what? For our second anniversary, we have TWO big announcements!

subtitles.original: The first one is...

subtitles.original: A BRAND NEW SONG!

subtitles.original: Our second original song in the story of Advent, “PRISONER”, will be released on August 31st at 12 AM local time in each region!
